pages.text: Wild, feral creatures usually found roaming within Hedge Mazes. They are naturally aggressive and appear to be untameable.
Mist Wolves are giant creatures that lurk within the Dark Forest. They blend into the shadows, and attempt to inflict blindness upon attacking.
The breath of a Winter Wolf is as bad as its bite! These canines weave between the spruce trunks in the Snowy Forest, and are naturally hostile. It seems melee attacks are their speciality...
